title: The Great Gatbsy
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, passionately pursues the elusive Daisy Buchanan.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
author: John Steinbeck
description: The socially significant novel about the hardships of a dispossessed family in Oklahoma during the Depression.

title: Nineteen Eighty-Four
author: George Orwell
description: George Orwell's nightmare vision of a totalitarian, bureaucratic world

title: Catch-22
author: Joseph Heller
description: Presents the contemporary classic depicting the struggles of a United States airman

title: Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D Salinger
description: In an effort to escape the hypocrisies of life at his boarding school, sixteen-year-old Holden Caulfield seeks refuge in New York City.
